verses.verse: I will stand <S%H5975><s%> at my watch, <S%H4931><s%> and set <S%H3320><s%> myself on the ramparts, <S%H4692><s%> and will look <S%H7200><s%> out to see <S%H7200><s%> what he will say <S%H1696><s%> to me, <S%H7725><s%> and what I will answer concerning my complaint. <S%H8433><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> me, <S%H3789><s%> "Write the vision, <S%H2377><s%> and make it plain <S%H874><s%> on tablets, <S%H3871><s%> that he who runs <S%H7323><s%> may read it. <S%H7121><s%>

For the vision <S%H2377><s%> is yet for the appointed time, <S%H4150><s%> and it hurries toward the end, <S%H7093><s%> and won't <S%H6315><s%> prove false. <S%H3576><s%> Though it takes time, <S%H4102><s%> wait <S%H4102><s%> for it; <S%H935><s%> because it will surely come. <S%H935><s%> It won't <S%H309><s%> delay.
Behold, <S%H5315><s%> his soul is puffed up. <S%H6075><s%> It is not upright <S%H3474><s%> in him, <S%H6662><s%> but the righteous will live <S%H2421><s%> by his faith. <S%H530><s%>

Yes, <S%H3196><s%> moreover, wine is treacherous. <S%H898><s%> A haughty <S%H3093><s%> man <S%H1397><s%> who doesn't <S%H5115><s%> stay at home, who enlarges <S%H7337><s%> his desire <S%H5315><s%> as Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> and he is like death, <S%H4194><s%> and can't <S%H7646><s%> be satisfied, but gathers <S%H622><s%> to himself all nations, <S%H1471><s%> and heaps <S%H6908><s%> to himself all peoples. <S%H5971><s%>

Won't <S%H5375><s%> all these take up a parable <S%H4912><s%> against him, <S%H4426><s%> and a taunting proverb <S%H2420><s%> against him, <S%H559><s%> and say, <S%H1945><s%> 'Woe to him who increases <S%H7235><s%> that which is not his, <S%H3513><s%> and who enriches himself by extortion! <S%H5671><s%> How long?'
Won't <S%H5391><s%> your debtors rise up <S%H6965><s%> suddenly, <S%H6621><s%> and wake <S%H3364><s%> up those who make you tremble, <S%H2111><s%> and you will be their victim? <S%H4933><s%>

Because you have plundered <S%H7997><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> all the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> will plunder <S%H7997><s%> you, <S%H120><s%> because of men's blood, <S%H1818><s%> and for the violence <S%H2555><s%> done to the land, <S%H776><s%> to the city <S%H7151><s%> and to all who dwell in it. <S%H3427><s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him who gets <S%H1214><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> gain <S%H1215><s%> for his house, <S%H1004><s%> that he may set <S%H7760><s%> his nest <S%H7064><s%> on high, <S%H4791><s%> that he may be delivered <S%H5337><s%> from the hand <S%H3709><s%> of evil! <S%H7451><s%>

You have devised <S%H3289><s%> shame <S%H1322><s%> to your house, <S%H1004><s%> by cutting off <S%H7096><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against your soul. <S%H5315><s%>
For the stone <S%H68><s%> will cry out <S%H2199><s%> of the wall, <S%H7023><s%> and the beam <S%H6086><s%> out <S%H3714><s%> of the woodwork will answer it. <S%H6030><s%>
Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him who builds <S%H1129><s%> a town <S%H5892><s%> with blood, <S%H1818><s%> and establishes <S%H3559><s%> a city <S%H7151><s%> by iniquity! <S%H5766><s%>

Behold, <S%H3068><s%> isn't it of Yahweh of Armies <S%H6635><s%> that the peoples <S%H5971><s%> labor <S%H3021><s%> for the <S%H1767><s%> fire, <S%H784><s%> and the nations <S%H3816><s%> weary <S%H3286><s%> themselves for <S%H1767><s%> vanity? <S%H7385><s%>

For the earth <S%H776><s%> will be filled <S%H4390><s%> with the knowledge <S%H3045><s%> of the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> as the waters <S%H4325><s%> cover <S%H3680><s%> the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

"Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him who gives his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> drink, <S%H8248><s%> pouring <S%H5596><s%> your inflaming wine <S%H2573><s%> until they are drunk, <S%H7937><s%> so that you may gaze <S%H5027><s%> at their naked bodies! <S%H4589><s%>

You are filled <S%H7646><s%> with shame, <S%H7036><s%> and not glory. <S%H3519><s%> You will also drink, <S%H8354><s%> and be exposed! <S%H6188><s%> The cup <S%H3563><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s right hand <S%H3225><s%> will come around <S%H5437><s%> to you, <S%H7022><s%> and disgrace will cover your glory. <S%H3519><s%>

For the violence <S%H2555><s%> done to Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> will overwhelm <S%H3680><s%> you, <S%H7701><s%> and the destruction of the animals, <S%H929><s%> which made them afraid; <S%H2865><s%> because of men <S%H120><s%>'s blood, <S%H1818><s%> and for the violence <S%H2555><s%> done to the land, <S%H776><s%> to every city <S%H7151><s%> and to those who dwell in them. <S%H3427><s%>

"What value does the engraved <S%H6458><s%> image <S%H6459><s%> have, <S%H3335><s%> that its maker has engraved <S%H6458><s%> it; <S%H4541><s%> the molten image, even the teacher <S%H3384><s%> of lies, <S%H8267><s%> that he who fashions <S%H3335><s%> its form <S%H3336><s%> trusts <S%H982><s%> in it, <S%H6213><s%> to make mute <S%H483><s%> idols? <S%H457><s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him who says <S%H559><s%> to the wood, <S%H6086><s%> <S%H6974><s%> 'Awake!' or to the mute <S%H1748><s%> stone, <S%H68><s%> <S%H5782><s%> 'Arise!' Shall this teach? <S%H3384><s%> Behold, <S%H8610><s%> it is overlaid with gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver, <S%H3701><s%> and there is no breath <S%H7307><s%> at all in its midst. <S%H7130><s%>
But Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is in his holy <S%H6944><s%> temple. <S%H1964><s%> Let all the earth <S%H776><s%> be silent <S%H2013><s%> before him! <S%H6440><s%>"
